name: Axil
description:
Axil is a  sci-fi game where you play as a botanist travelling the galaxy, collecting exterrestrials specimens to grow and study!

Concept by Emma Fulkerson

Artists: Robert Brush & Emma Fulkerson

Programmers: Gwyn Hultquist, Joe Schmidt, & Riley Stetler

Writer: Katelynn Gossage

Producer: Zachary Siddiq
